mess around.translation[0].definitions[0: to spend time lazily, doing things slowly and in a way that is not planned
He spent his vacation messing around on the farm.
mess around.translation[0].definitions[1: to behave in a silly way when you should be paying attention or doing something sensible
Stop messing around and get ready for school.
mess around.translation[0].definitions[2: to cause a lot of problems for someone, especially by changing your mind often and not being completely honest
Don’t mess me around – I want the money you promised me.
